infoBox.title: What are reduction reasons?
infoBox.content:
Reduction reasons are circumstances or qualifications that allow you to shorten the regular training duration. This can help you complete your training faster.

How are they applied?

Reduction reasons are credited to the regular training duration. Depending on the type of reason, different reductions may be granted. The reductions are added together until a maximum is reached.

How many can be used simultaneously?

You can specify multiple reduction reasons simultaneously. The total reduction is calculated from all selected reasons. However, note that there is a maximum reduction of 21 months that cannot be exceeded.
